nodes.text: The Nouane system was a star system located in the Inner Rim region of the galaxy. By the fifth year of Emperor Palpatine's reign, the system was a client-state of his Galactic Empire.

The Nouane system was mentioned canonically in the 2014 novel Tarkin, written by James Luceno. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the Nouane system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
